MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.49pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional investigations being required to identify the faulty apparatus and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:39pm on Sunday, 11 October 2020
